title: 1961–62 European Cup Winners' Cup
text:
The 1961–62 season of the <a href="UEFA%20Cup%20Winners%27%20Cup">European Cup Winners' Cup</a> club <a href="association%20football">football</a> tournament was won by <a href="Atl%C3%A9tico%20Madrid">Atlético Madrid</a> of Spain in a replayed final against holders <a href="ACF%20Fiorentina">Fiorentina</a>. It was the first season of the tournament to be directly organised by <a href="UEFA">UEFA</a>.
Preliminary round.
Second leg.
"Dunfermline Athletic won 8–1 on aggregate."
First round.
Second leg.
"Fiorentina won 9–3 on aggregate."
"Leixões won 2–1 on aggregate."
Quarter-finals.
Second leg.
"Fiorentina won 4–2 on aggregate."
Semi-finals.
Second leg.
"Atlético Madrid won 5–0 on aggregate."
"Fiorentina won 3–0 on aggregate."
